verses.verse: וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> become כִּֽי־ <WH3588> shall be when תָב֣וֹא <WH935> And it shall be when thou [art] come in אֶל־ <WH413> about הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> unto the land אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> giveth לְךָ֖ נַחֲלָ֑ה <WH5159> thee [for] an inheritance וִֽירִשְׁתָּ֖הּ <WH3423> and possessest וְיָשַׁ֥בְתָּ <WH3427> it and dwellest בָּֽהּ׃

וְלָקַחְתָּ֞ <WH3947> That thou shalt take מֵרֵאשִׁ֣ית ׀ <WH7225> of the first כָּל־ <WH3605> of all פְּרִ֣י <WH6529> of all the fruit הָאֲדָמָ֗ה <WH127> of the earth אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which תָּבִ֧יא <WH935> which thou shalt bring מֵֽאַרְצְךָ֛ <WH776> of thy land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <WH430> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> giveth לָ֖ךְ וְשַׂמְתָּ֣ <WH7760> thee and shalt put בַטֶּ֑נֶא <WH2935> [it] in a basket וְהָֽלַכְתָּ֙ <WH1980> and shalt go אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמָּק֔וֹם <WH4725> unto the place אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which יִבְחַר֙ <WH977> shall choose יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God לְשַׁכֵּ֥ן <WH7931> to place שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> in it

וּבָאתָ֙ <WH935> And thou shalt go אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> unto the priest אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become בַּיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> that shall be in those days הָהֵ֑ם <WH1992> like וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> and say אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him הִגַּ֤דְתִּי <WH5046> unto him I profess הַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> this day לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God כִּי־ <WH3588> for בָ֙אתִי֙ <WH935> that I am come אֶל־ <WH413> about הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> unto the country אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֧ע <WH7650> sware יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> which the LORD לַאֲבֹתֵ֖ינוּ <WH1> unto our fathers לָ֥תֶת <WH5414> for to give לָֽנוּ׃

וְלָקַ֧ח <WH3947> shall take הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> And the priest הַטֶּ֖נֶא <WH2935> the basket מִיָּדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> out of thine hand וְהִ֨נִּיח֔וֹ <WH3240> and set it down לִפְנֵ֕י <WH6440> before מִזְבַּ֖ח <WH4196> the altar יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> thy God

וְעָנִ֨יתָ <WH6030> And thou shalt speak וְאָמַרְתָּ֜ <WH559> and say לִפְנֵ֣י ׀ <WH6440> before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <WH430> thy God אֲרַמִּי֙ <WH761> A Syrian אֹבֵ֣ד <WH6> ready to perish אָבִ֔י <WH1> [was] my father וַיֵּ֣רֶד <WH3381> and he went down מִצְרַ֔יְמָה <WH4714> into Egypt וַיָּ֥גָר <WH1481> and sojourned שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there בִּמְתֵ֣י <WH4462> Memucan מְעָ֑ט <WH4592> a few וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> became שָׁ֕ם <WH8033> there לְג֥וֹי <WH1471> and became there a nation גָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> great עָצ֥וּם <WH6099> mighty וָרָֽב׃ <WH7227> and populous

וַיָּרֵ֧עוּ <WH7489> evil entreated אֹתָ֛נוּ <WH854> for הַמִּצְרִ֖ים <WH4713> And the Egyptians וַיְעַנּ֑וּנוּ <WH6031> us and afflicted וַיִּתְּנ֥וּ <WH5414> us and laid עָלֵ֖ינוּ <WH5921> and עֲבֹדָ֥ה <WH5656> bondage קָשָֽׁה׃ <WH7186> upon us hard

וַנִּצְעַ֕ק <WH6817> And when we cried אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God אֲבֹתֵ֑ינוּ <WH1> of our fathers וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> heard יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> קֹלֵ֔נוּ <WH6963> our voice וַיַּ֧רְא <WH7200> and looked אֶת־ <WH853> עָנְיֵ֛נוּ <WH6040> on our affliction וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֲמָלֵ֖נוּ <WH5999> and our labour וְאֶת־ <WH853> לַחֲצֵֽנוּ׃ <WH3906> and our oppression

וַיּוֹצִאֵ֤נוּ <WH3318> brought us forth יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt בְּיָ֤ד <WH3027> hand חֲזָקָה֙ <WH2389> with a mighty וּבִזְרֹ֣עַ <WH2220> arm נְטוּיָ֔ה <WH5186> and with an outstretched וּבְמֹרָ֖א <WH4172> terribleness גָּדֹ֑ל <WH1419> and with great וּבְאֹת֖וֹת <WH226> and with signs וּבְמֹפְתִֽים׃ <WH4159> and with wonders

וַיְבִאֵ֖נוּ <WH935> And he hath brought אֶל־ <WH413> about הַמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> us into this place הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> to this וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> and hath given לָ֙נוּ֙ אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> us this land הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise אֶ֛רֶץ <WH776> [even] a land זָבַ֥ת <WH2100> that floweth חָלָ֖ב <WH2461> with milk וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <WH1706> and honey

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> behold הֵבֵ֙אתִי֙ <WH935> And now behold I have brought אֶת־ <WH853> רֵאשִׁית֙ <WH7225> the first פְּרִ֣י <WH6529> of the produce הָאֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> of the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נָתַ֥תָּה <WH5414> hast given לִּ֖י יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> which thou O LORD וְהִנַּחְתּ֗וֹ <WH3240> me And thou shalt set לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> it before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God וְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוִ֔יתָ <WH7812> and worship לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> thy God

וְשָׂמַחְתָּ֣ <WH8056> glad בְכָל־ <WH3605> all הַטּ֗וֹב <WH2896> in every good אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> who נָֽתַן־ <WH5414> hath given לְךָ֛ יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> [thing] which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God וּלְבֵיתֶ֑ךָ <WH1004> unto thee and unto thine house אַתָּה֙ <WH859> and you וְהַלֵּוִ֔י <WH3881> thou and the Levite וְהַגֵּ֖ר <WH1616> and the stranger אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בְּקִרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <WH7130> that [is] among ס

כִּ֣י <WH3588> When תְכַלֶּ֞ה <WH3615> When thou hast made an end לַ֠עְשֵׂר <WH6237> of tithing אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַעְשַׂ֧ר <WH4643> all the tithes תְּבוּאָתְךָ֛ <WH8393> of thine increase בַּשָּׁנָ֥ה <WH8141> year הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֖ת <WH7992> the third שְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> [which is] the year הַֽמַּעֲשֵׂ֑ר <WH4643> of tithing וְנָתַתָּ֣ה <WH5414> and hast given לַלֵּוִ֗י <WH3881> [it] unto the Levite לַגֵּר֙ <WH1616> the stranger לַיָּת֣וֹם <WH3490> the fatherless וְלָֽאַלְמָנָ֔ה <WH490> and the widow וְאָכְל֥וּ <WH398> that they may eat בִשְׁעָרֶ֖יךָ <WH8179> within thy gates וְשָׂבֵֽעוּ׃ <WH7646> and be filled

וְאָמַרְתָּ֡ <WH559> Then thou shalt say לִפְנֵי֩ <WH6440> before יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <WH430> thy God בִּעַ֧רְתִּי <WH1197> I have brought away הַקֹּ֣דֶשׁ <WH6944> the hallowed things מִן־ <WH4480> any הַבַּ֗יִת <WH1004> out of [mine] house וְגַ֨ם <WH1571> and also נְתַתִּ֤יו <WH5414> and also have given לַלֵּוִי֙ <WH3881> them unto the Levite וְלַגֵּר֙ <WH1616> and unto the stranger לַיָּת֣וֹם <WH3490> to the fatherless וְלָאַלְמָנָ֔ה <WH490> and to the widow כְּכָל־ <WH3605> to all מִצְוָתְךָ֖ <WH4687> according to all thy commandments אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which צִוִּיתָ֑נִי <WH6680> which thou hast commanded לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not עָבַ֥רְתִּי <WH5674> me I have not transgressed מִמִּצְוֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH4687> thy commandments וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> or שָׁכָֽחְתִּי׃ <WH7911> neither have I forgotten

לֹא־ <WH3808> nor אָכַ֨לְתִּי <WH398> I have not eaten בְאֹנִ֜י <WH205> thereof in my mourning מִמֶּ֗נּוּ <WH4480> any וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor בִעַ֤רְתִּי <WH1197> neither have I taken away מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <WH4480> any בְּטָמֵ֔א <WH2931> [ought] thereof for [any] unclean וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> [use] nor given מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> any לְמֵ֑ת <WH4191> [ought] thereof for the dead שָׁמַ֗עְתִּי <WH8085> [but] I have hearkened בְּקוֹל֙ <WH6963> to the voice יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהָ֔י <WH430> my God עָשִׂ֕יתִי <WH6213> [and] have done כְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you צִוִּיתָֽנִי׃ <WH6680> according to all that thou hast commanded

הַשְׁקִיפָה֩ <WH8259> Look down מִמְּע֨וֹן <WH4583> habitation קָדְשְׁךָ֜ <WH6944> from thy holy מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׁמַ֗יִם <WH8064> from heaven וּבָרֵ֤ךְ <WH1288> and bless אֶֽת־ <WH853> עַמְּךָ֙ <WH5971> thy people אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel וְאֵת֙ <WH853> הָאֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> and the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נָתַ֖תָּה <WH5414> which thou hast given לָ֑נוּ כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֙עְתָּ֙ <WH7650> us as thou swarest לַאֲבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <WH1> unto our fathers אֶ֛רֶץ <WH776> a land זָבַ֥ת <WH2100> that floweth חָלָ֖ב <WH2461> with milk וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <WH1706> and honey ס

הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> This day הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> This יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <WH430> thy God מְצַוְּךָ֧ <WH6680> hath commanded לַעֲשׂ֛וֹת <WH6213> thee to do אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֻקִּ֥ים <WH2706> these statutes הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֑ים <WH4941> and judgments וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֤ <WH8104> thou shalt therefore keep וְעָשִׂ֙יתָ֙ <WH6213> and do אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לְבָבְךָ֖ <WH3824> them with all thine heart וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH5315> and with all thy soul

אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD הֶאֱמַ֖רְתָּ <WH559> Thou hast avouched הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> this day לִהְיוֹת֩ <WH1961> become לְךָ֨ לֵֽאלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> to be thy God וְלָלֶ֣כֶת <WH1980> walk בִּדְרָכָ֗יו <WH1870> in his ways וְלִשְׁמֹ֨ר <WH8104> and to keep חֻקָּ֧יו <WH2706> his statutes וּמִצְוֹתָ֛יו <WH4687> and his commandments וּמִשְׁפָּטָ֖יו <WH4941> and his judgments וְלִשְׁמֹ֥עַ <WH8085> and to hearken בְּקֹלֽוֹ׃ <WH6963> unto his voice

וַֽיהוָ֞ה <WH3068> And the LORD הֶאֱמִֽירְךָ֣ <WH559> hath avouched הַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> thee this day לִהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> become לוֹ֙ לְעַ֣ם <WH5971> people סְגֻלָּ֔ה <WH5459> to be his peculiar כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> he דִּבֶּר־ <WH1696> as he hath promised לָ֑ךְ וְלִשְׁמֹ֖ר <WH8104> thee and that [thou] shouldest keep כָּל־ <WH3605> all מִצְוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH4687> all his commandments

וּֽלְתִתְּךָ֣ <WH5414> And to make עֶלְי֗וֹן <WH5945> thee high עַ֤ל <WH5921> above כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> above all nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> which he hath made לִתְהִלָּ֖ה <WH8416> in praise וּלְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> and in name וּלְתִפְאָ֑רֶת <WH8597> and in honour וְלִֽהְיֹתְךָ֧ <WH1961> become עַם־ <WH5971> people קָדֹ֛שׁ <WH6918> and that thou mayest be an holy לַיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which דִּבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> as he hath spoken ס
